channel.title: Help! disconnects when i use certain commands and teleports
channel.description: Hi, on the source and client I'm using, (teamtorva v3) and its a PI base, there's a few commands and teleport that when I use them it disconnects me from the server. But when I log back in, I'm at the area that I teleported to. If anyone can help me or point me In the right direction it would be of great appreciation and thanks!

item.title: Help! disconnects when i use certain commands and teleports
item.dc:creator: @tigman9 tigman9
item.description:
@tigman9 wrote:

in the server cmd when i click the button it says [player-1] Fatal: couldn't find connection vertex! Dropping packet.

Read full topic
